entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
